question.title: What is the characteristic feature of the skin lesions in pemphigus vulgaris?
question.description: The type of skin lesions present in pemphigus vulgaris

option_a.title: Tender and firm nodules
option_a.description: A common description of skin lesions in pemphigus vulgaris

option_b.title: Tender or flaccid bubbles with jagged edges
option_b.description: A characteristic description of skin lesions in pemphigus vulgaris

option_c.title: Hard and indurated plaques
option_c.description: A common description of skin lesions in psoriasis

option_d.title: Itchy and scaly patches
option_d.description: A characteristic description of skin lesions in eczema

correct_option.title: B
correct_option.description: The correct letter of the correct option
